jv.rsrc

Class PuBugReport

  • java.lang.Object
    • jv.rsrc.PuBugReport

  • public class PuBugReport
extends java.lang.Object
    Simple class to send bug reports by email, using the standard email editor of the operating system.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PuBugReport() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void sendEmail()
      Call the System's email editor and set recipient, subject and body of the email according to the JavaView bug report standards.
      static void sendMail(java.lang.String to, java.lang.String cc, java.lang.String bcc, java.lang.String subject, java.lang.String body)
      Launch the default email client of the operating system, and fill fields such as recipients, subject and message body according to the arguments.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • PuBugReport

        public PuBugReport()

    • Method Detail

      • sendEmail

        public static void sendEmail()
        Call the System's email editor and set recipient, subject and body of the email according to the JavaView bug report standards.

      • sendMail

        public static void sendMail(java.lang.String to,
            java.lang.String cc,
            java.lang.String bcc,
            java.lang.String subject,
            java.lang.String body)
        Launch the default email client of the operating system, and fill fields such as recipients, subject and message body according to the arguments. All strings must be URI conform, so replace spaces with " " etc. All arguments may be "" or null.
        Parameters:
        to - Recipient.
        cc - Recipient of a copy.
        bcc - Recipient of a blind copy.
        subject - Subject title.
        body - Message body.
